name: The Celia Cruz Wig NFT Auction

metadata.name: The Celia Cruz Wig NFT Auction. Sponsored by Hairclub.
metadata.description: In honor of Hispanic Heritage Month and as part of the award-winning 'El Poder del Cabello' campaign, HairClub and the Celia Cruz Foundation are teaming up to pay tribute to 'La Reina de la Salsa' (The Queen of Salsa) Celia Cruz. HairClub President and CEO Mike Nassar announced the commissioned of a commemorative certified replica paired with an NFT design of Cruz's wig to be auctioned during the week of her birthday, which falls on October 21.

attributes.value: HAIRCLUB JOINS HISPANIC HERITAGE MONTH CELEBRATION WITH “EL PODER DEL CABELLO” (THE POWER OF HAIR) CAMPAIGN COMMISSIONING AN NFT OF SALSA QUEEN CELIA CRUZ’S FAMOUS WIGS
